title: Chair Seat, 1800–10
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery
description: Octagonal medallion of upholstery fabric illustrating a fable by Aesop known as "The Fox and the Goat." The pattern is in white and shades of yellow on a light blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chair Seat, 1800–10. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery. 1974-1-2-d.
